content: Ha detto a tutti che era al sicuro.
translations: eng:He told everybody he was safe
eng:He told everybody that he was safe
eng:He told everyone he was safe
eng:He told everyone that he was safe
eng:She told everybody she was safe
eng:She told everybody that she was safe
eng:She told everyone that she was safe
